DataElement.preferredName: Cognitive Function Computerized Neurocognitive Battery Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._The normal action performed by a structure or device._A series of tests designed to measure performance accuracy and speed on specific neurobehavioral tasks. The included tests measure: abstraction and mental flexibility, attention, working memory, episodic memory (word, face, and spatial recognition memory), language reasoning, spatial processing, sensorimotor, motor speed, and emotion identification. Accuracy is scored as the total number of correct responses and speed is scored as the median response time (RT) for correct items._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._The normal action performed by a structure or device._A series of tests designed to measure performance accuracy and speed on specific neurobehavioral tasks. The included tests measure: abstraction and mental flexibility, attention, working memory, episodic memory (word, face, and spatial recognition memory), language reasoning, spatial processing, sensorimotor, motor speed, and emotion identification. Accuracy is scored as the total number of correct responses and speed is scored as the median response time (RT) for correct items.

Property.preferredDefinition: A series of tests designed to measure performance accuracy and speed on specific neurobehavioral tasks. The included tests measure: abstraction and mental flexibility, attention, working memory, episodic memory (word, face, and spatial recognition memory), language reasoning, spatial processing, sensorimotor, motor speed, and emotion identification. Accuracy is scored as the total number of correct responses and speed is scored as the median response time (RT) for correct items.

Concepts.definition: A series of tests designed to measure performance accuracy and speed on specific neurobehavioral tasks. The included tests measure: abstraction and mental flexibility, attention, working memory, episodic memory (word, face, and spatial recognition memory), language reasoning, spatial processing, sensorimotor, motor speed, and emotion identification. Accuracy is scored as the total number of correct responses and speed is scored as the median response time (RT) for correct items.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: The Computerized Neurocogniti
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Computerized Neurocognitive Battery (CNB) is a series of tests used in neuroimaging studies that are formatted like computer games and puzzles, and are administered by study investigators.
